page.title: 13TRADE AROUND BISHOPS FROME
page.content: In addition to the businesses mentioned under industry, the following exist: Frome Valley Transport - heavy goods hauliers. Mend-a-Bath International - repair old baths, renovate bathrooms. The Garage - a petrol station, car repair centre, AA get-you-home Centre and Taxi Service. A car body repair centre. Fir Tree Garage - a car sales and servicing centre. Post Office and General Stores with wide range of merchandise (food, newspapers, stationery, tobacco). Two hairdressers, one working from home and one from a salon. A small nursery with limited range of shrubs and bedding plants. A riding stables offering rising lessons and summer riding holidays for youngsters. A painter-decorator-carpenter, Sole trader businesses operating from home
